name: Fairly Nude
storyline: A naked man's great escape from the cops.
summary:
Important: this game is still in development. A demo will be released soon. 
 
Fairly Nude is the only unoriginal Platformer you should play! Well, when it comes out, that is. You play as this naked guy who jumps over spikes and stuff! Fairly Nude offers a hope crushing experience that'll leave you crying for more, or maybe less. Who cares?! You play as a naked guy! 
 
In each level, there is one checkpoint and one trophy, which is required in order to progress to the next level. Each time you die, you lose the trophy, and therefore will have to go back and get it in order to complete the level. 
 
Follow a simple yet fun story as you progress. Enjoy the colorful and basic pixel art, and listen to the 8-bit sound effects the game has to offer. 
 
This game is for you: 
- If you like hardcore platformers 
- If you like Tight controls 
- If you like Simple & charming pixel art 
- If you like Satisfying sound effects 
- If you like Humor 
- If you like games that focus on timing and reactions. 
 
For more info, check out these links:

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fairlynuude/
